Annotation.note:
The circumradius $OP$ of the triangle $ABC$ meets the sides of the triangle in the points $G$, $H$, $I$. Show that the projections $J$, $K$, $L$, of these points upon the lines $AP$, $BP$, $CP$ lie on the Simson line of $P$ for $ABC$.
\begin{keywords} geometry theorem proving \end{keywords}
